He was A court has heard how a French student was caught by police after he taped a webcam to a mop handle and used it to spy on a couple having sex in the apartment above. Jerome Forrier told Dundee police that he did so because he wanted to see if they`` were normal people. The court heard how Forrier was caught after the women saw his home-made device and sent her boyfriend downstairs to investigate.
